scripts.cucumber-report:prepare: npm run cucumber-report:clear && npm run cucumber-report:json
scripts.e2e:api: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome --config-file cypress.config.api.js
scripts.e2e:api:regression: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome --config-file cypress.config.api.js -e TAGS="@regression"
scripts.e2e:ui: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev TZ=UTC npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome --config-file cypress.config.ui.js --browser chrome --headed
scripts.e2e:ui:headless: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev TZ=UTC npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome --config-file cypress.config.ui.js --browser chrome
scripts.e2e:ui:regression: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev TZ=UTC npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome --config-file cypress.config.ui.js --browser chrome --headed -e TAGS="@regression"
scripts.e2e:api:run: npm run cucumber-report:json && npm run e2e:api -e TAGS='@regression'
scripts.e2e:ui:run: npm run cucumber-report:json && npm run e2e:ui -e TAGS='@regression'
